GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v5.15.56
GSD.description:
sfc: fix use after free when disabling sriov

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.56 by commit 58d93e9d160c0de6d867c7eb4c2206671a351eb1, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit 3c5eb87605e85146a78de589b5070a37862425db. For more details please see the references link.
